podcast.name: Plays Well with Others
podcast.description: From Creative Commons, a podcast about the art and science of collaboration. With a focus on the tools, techniques, and mechanics of collaboration, we explore how today's most interesting collaborators are making new things, solving old problems, and getting things done â€” together. Hosted by Creative Commons CEO Ryan Merkley.

podcast_episode.title: Coming Soon
podcast_episode.name: Coming Soon
podcast_episode.description: <p>From Creative Commons, a new podcast about the art and science of collaboration. With a focus on the tools, techniques, and mechanics of collaboration, we’re going to explore how today's most interesting collaborators are making new things, solving old problems, and getting things done — together. Hosted by Creative Commons CEO Ryan Merkley. Premieres Tuesday, February 19.</p>
podcast_episode.filename: Plays Well with Others - Coming Soon.mp3

podcast.name: Trace
podcast.description: An investigative podcast hosted by ABC journalist Rachael Brown, Trace examines the fractures in Australia's criminal justice system, and the decades-long ripples they have caused.
podcast.copyright: Copyright 2021, Australian Broadcasting Corporation. All Rights Reserved.

podcast_episode.title: S1 | Breakthrough in Maria James cold case
podcast_episode.name: S1 | Breakthrough in Maria James cold case
podcast_episode.description: The discovery of a police exhibit - thought to be missing for around three decades - could finally help unmask the killer in the 1980 cold case of Maria James.
podcast_episode.filename: Trace - S1 | Breakthrough in Maria James cold case.

podcast_episode.title: S2 BONUS — The Price
podcast_episode.name: S2 BONUS — The Price
podcast_episode.description: The Royal Commission has released its final report into defence lawyer turned police informer Nicola Gobbo.
podcast_episode.filename: Trace - S2 BONUS — The Price.

podcast_episode.title: S2 08 | End game
podcast_episode.name: S2 08 | End game
podcast_episode.description: We reveal the story of Nicola Gobbo's audacious bid to return to Australia.
podcast_episode.filename: Trace - S2 08 | End game.

podcast_episode.title: S2 07 | Reckoning
podcast_episode.name: S2 07 | Reckoning
podcast_episode.description: Everything unravels, for Nicola Gobbo and Victoria Police. Their secret is out.
podcast_episode.filename: Trace - S2 07 | Reckoning.

podcast_episode.title: S2 06 | Whatever it takes
podcast_episode.name: S2 06 | Whatever it takes
podcast_episode.description: Nicola hits rock bottom, but Victoria Police wants her to take on a new role ... as a witness.
podcast_episode.filename: Trace - S2 06 | Whatever it takes.

podcast_episode.title: S2 05 | Glittering prize
podcast_episode.name: S2 05 | Glittering prize
podcast_episode.description: Nicola wants to be the best source ever, and she leads police to the biggest target of all: the mafia. Her double life is getting riskier, but she can't stop. This episode charts an addiction and a crash.
podcast_episode.filename: Trace - S2 05 | Glittering prize.

podcast_episode.title: S2 04 | Rubicon
podcast_episode.name: S2 04 | Rubicon
podcast_episode.description: Nicola crosses the point of no return and becomes a police informer. She'll represent clients, while passing on the underworld's secrets to Victoria Police.
podcast_episode.filename: Trace - S2 04 | Rubicon.

podcast_episode.title: S2 03 | The darkest night
podcast_episode.name: S2 03 | The darkest night
podcast_episode.description: A drug house burglary smells of police corruption and a police informer is executed.
podcast_episode.filename: Trace - S2 03 | The darkest night.

podcast_episode.title: S2 02 | One of the crew
podcast_episode.name: S2 02 | One of the crew
podcast_episode.description: As the gangland war explodes, both police and criminals start questioning Nicola's allegiances. Where do her loyalties lie?
podcast_episode.filename: Trace - S2 02 | One of the crew.

podcast_episode.title: S2 01 | Nicola
podcast_episode.name: S2 01 | Nicola
podcast_episode.description: We meet Nicola Gobbo in a secret location, in hiding, now that her double life as a police informer is out, and she begins telling us her full story.
podcast_episode.filename: Trace - S2 01 | Nicola.
